languages.text: "Наконец... тайна Атласа раскрыта. То, что я столько лет носила в своей груди, получило свое объяснение... как и мои особые силы".
"At last... the mystery of Atlas is revealed. What I carried in my chest for so many years has been explained... as have my special powers."
languages.original_text: "Наконец... тайна Атласа раскрыта. То, что я столько лет носила в своей груди, получило свое объяснение... как и мои особые силы".

traits.locale_text: "At last... the mystery of Atlas is revealed. What I carried in my chest for so many years has been explained... as have my special powers."
"At last... the mystery of Atlas is revealed. What I carried in my chest for so many years has been explained... as have my special powers."
"At last... the mystery of Atlas is revealed. What I carried in my chest for so many years has been explained... as have my special powers."
"At last... the mystery of Atlas is revealed. What I carried in my chest for so many years has been explained... as have my special powers."

languages.text: “终于……圣仪之谜被解开了。这么多年来，一直嵌在我胸口里的东西，以及我的特殊能力，终于得到了解释……”
languages.original_text: "At last... the mystery of Atlas is revealed. What I carried in my chest for so many years has been explained... as have my special powers."

traits.locale_text: “终于……圣仪之谜被解开了。这么多年来，一直嵌在我胸口里的东西，以及我的特殊能力，终于得到了解释……”

languages.text: « Le mystère de l'Atlas a enfin été résolu... Je sais enfin ce que je transporte dans ma poitrine depuis toutes ces années... et d'où me viennent mes pouvoirs spéciaux. »
languages.original_text: "At last... the mystery of Atlas is revealed. What I carried in my chest for so many years has been explained... as have my special powers."

traits.locale_text: « Le mystère de l'Atlas a enfin été résolu... Je sais enfin ce que je transporte dans ma poitrine depuis toutes ces années... et d'où me viennent mes pouvoirs spéciaux. »

languages.text: «Por fin... el misterio del Atlas sale a la luz. Lo que llevaba en mi pecho todos estos años queda explicado... junto con los poderes especiales que poseo».
languages.original_text: "At last... the mystery of Atlas is revealed. What I carried in my chest for so many years has been explained... as have my special powers."

traits.locale_text: «Por fin... el misterio del Atlas sale a la luz. Lo que llevaba en mi pecho todos estos años queda explicado... junto con los poderes especiales que poseo».

languages.text: 「ついに...アトラスの謎が明らかになりました。私が長年胸に秘めてきたものが解明されました...私の特別な力も」
languages.original_text: "At last... the mystery of Atlas is revealed. What I carried in my chest for so many years has been explained... as have my special powers."

traits.locale_text: 「ついに...アトラスの謎が明らかになりました。私が長年胸に秘めてきたものが解明されました...私の特別な力も」

languages.text: "Endlich ... das Mysterium des Atlas ist ergründet. Was ich so viele Jahre in meiner Brust getragen habe, ist nun erklärt ... genau wie meine besonderen Kräfte."
languages.original_text: "At last... the mystery of Atlas is revealed. What I carried in my chest for so many years has been explained... as have my special powers."

traits.locale_text: "Endlich ... das Mysterium des Atlas ist ergründet. Was ich so viele Jahre in meiner Brust getragen habe, ist nun erklärt ... genau wie meine besonderen Kräfte."

languages.original_text: "At last... the mystery of Atlas is revealed. What I carried in my chest for so many years has been explained... as have my special powers."

languages.text: "Nihayet... Atlas'ın gizemi açıklandı. Yıllardır göğsümde taşıdığım yük ve özel güçlerim gün ışığına çıktı."
languages.original_text: "At last... the mystery of Atlas is revealed. What I carried in my chest for so many years has been explained... as have my special powers."

traits.locale_text: "Nihayet... Atlas'ın gizemi açıklandı. Yıllardır göğsümde taşıdığım yük ve özel güçlerim gün ışığına çıktı."
